mapper.insert: insert into helf_boards (board_no, board_title, board_content, board_type, user_id, board_main) values (helf_boards_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{type}, #{user.id}, #{main} )
mapper.select: select * from(select board_no as no, board_title as title, board_content as content, board_create_date as createDate, board_update_date as updateDate, board_deleted as deleted, board_read_count as readCount, board_type as type, user_id as "user.id", board_delete_date as deleteDate, board_main as main, row_number() over (order by board_main asc, board_no asc) rownumber from helf_boards ) where rownumber between #{begin} and #{end}

select board_title as title, board_content as content, board_create_date as createDate, board_update_date as updateDate, board_deleted as deleted, board_read_count as readCount, board_type as type, user_id as "user.id", board_delete_date as deleteDate, board_main as main from helf_boards where board_no = #{no}
